data.meta_description: Sing over 10 million of your favorite songs with music & scrolling lyrics! Sing your favorite songs solo, have fun creating a duet or group performance with friâ¦
data.text:
Sing over 10 million of your favorite songs with music & scrolling lyrics! Sing your favorite songs solo, have fun creating a duet or group performance with friends, collaborate with other singers from around the world, or sing alongside recordings of popular music artists! Record with your camera on or off and add professional audio FX to sound amazing and have fun!

With millions of karaoke songs to choose from, youâre sure to find all of the music you love. Use our voice recorder with scrolling music lyrics so you donât miss a beat. Smule is fun for everyone, whether youâre a beginner or an experienced vocalist!

FEATURES

â¢ Sing over 10+ million of your favorite karaoke songs w/ scrolling lyrics! Karaoke anytime, anywhere.

â¢ Record songs solo, in a duet or group, a cappella, or enjoy other singersâ performances!

â¢ Create studio-quality audio & add vocal FX that make you sound amazing!

â¢ Host or join a live karaoke party! Our Sing LIVE feature lets you give live, audio-only performances 24/7 with friends & music lovers from around the world!

â¢ Record songs with your camera off for audio-only performances or turn it on & get creative with fun video FX & filters!

â¢ Sing side-by-side in recorded duets with top music artists like Dua Lipa, Olivia Rodrigo, Charlie Puth, Ed Sheeran, classic Disney characters, & more!

â¢ Save your recordings privately as you practice & learn how to sing, or share your performances with the Smule community!

â¢ Record and share music performances on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, WhatsApp, & more!

â¢ Create your own music videos! Use Smule as a music video editor and record audio & vocals first & then add your own video FX!

â¢ Freestyle Mode: Record original songs & invite others to join you!

â¢ Join in new Smule challenges & contests monthly to win prizes & get noticed!

â¢ Record personalized voice messages for family & friends!

â¢ Practice with an on-screen pitch guide & original tutorials!

â¢ Search trending hits & sing the lyrics from your favorite part of the song with our Moments feature!

LET'S MUSIC TOGETHERâ¢

Choose from pop, a cappella, R&B, rock, rap, hip-hop, country, K-Pop, musicals, & more! With new songs added daily, youâll find all your favorite songs & karaoke hits here.

Is your song missing? Upload songs & trending hits to the Songbook:

https://www.smule.com/support/upload#songbook

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSICâ¢

We believe music is about more than just listeningâit's about creating, sharing, discovering, participating, & connecting. As the original social network, it has the power to break down barriers & bring people together. Join our global community & sing songs that express who you are.

FIND YOUR VOICE

All singers can sound great on Smule. Use music FX & video filters on Smule Styles to make your performances pop!

If you love karaoke, like to sing, or simply love music, then try Smule for free now!

SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS

- Subscribe for unlimited access to our full karaoke song catalog and sing karaoke solos, duets, group songs and a cappella for the duration of your subscription

- Subscriptions are weekly, monthly and annual*

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period

- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings

- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period

- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription

- You can read our privacy policy at www.smule.com/privacy

*Price are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines is the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD

https://www.smule.com/termsofservice

TheRogueElemen7 ,

Community is great - App is Meh... Best collection of tracks tho

First I want to assure everybody that this app is not getting updated anywhere near as much as the update log would have you believe lolâ¦ it is simply compliance with Appleâs update frequency rule. App performance has never really âimprovedâ The entire three years Iâve been using it; at times it has gotten worse and then return to normal, but I deal with the same bugs Iâve been dealing with since I started on here. If you really look through the log youâll see that any time they make even the most minor of ACTUAL changes, they take care to point it out. The most recent actual change was a UI adjustment, that tried to help take the sting out of a recent-ish UI change that I personally dislike rather strongly. The community is pretty awesome as long as you are not a tool, and Iâve never seen a bigger collection of songs on any of the other apps. It also has slightly, to moderately less bots than the other apps Iâve seen as well. Social features suuuuuck but in some ways, I can appreciate the effect that has on the platform overall. It absolutely isnât intentionally so lol - same low effort results. Sometimes I wonder if there is just one person programming this, that barely knows how to program. Considering the cost of a pro membership, the absolute lack of any kind of decent functionality is not really acceptable IMO. Other apps have FAR more advanced social features, and have been around for far less time.

Developer Response ,

Hey, you do raise some good points! We'll take your suggestions into account and will continue to work hard to bring you a better experience! We are here to improve your experience with the Smule app! Could you please drop us a message at support@smule.com? You can send us more details on what we can do to improve our services. We are always happy to get feedback from our users!
